name: mercilessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has or shows no mercy (= kindness or willingness to forgive): Louis was teased mercilessly by his schoolmates. The sun beat down mercilessly all day. See
merciless
More examplesFewer examplesHe didn't fit in there, and was picked on mercilessly.The lorry bumped and shuddered mercilessly through the desert tracks.A plump child, he was bullied mercilessly.
